channel.title: Microsoft Dynamics Forecaster on 0x000216
channel.description: Recent content in Microsoft Dynamics Forecaster on 0x000216

item.title: The creation wizard for the forecaster database has failed. We apologize for the inconvenience.
item.description:
Setting up a new database in Forecaster is usually simple. You just open the Forecaster Database Creation Wizard, connect to your SQL Server, input the database details, and you’re done. However, recently I encountered a problem where the wizard unexpectedly stopped working after I named the new database. This happened on multiple computers, but interestingly, creating the database on a different SQL Server worked fine. After checking the Application Event Log, I found a vague ...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-creation-wizard-for-the-forecaster-database-has-failed-we-apologize-for-the-inconvenience/
